(B) The Negative 

              (Words of Restraint and Caution) 


     Marriage Not Designed to Cover Sensuality and Base Practices.--God never designed that marriage should cover the multitude of sins that are practiced. Sensuality and base practices in a marriage relation are educating the mind and moral taste for demoralizing practices outside the marriage relation.--RH, May 24, 1887.
